commands.name: manage-downloads
commands.title: Manage Downloads
commands.description: Search and organize your downloaded files

commands.name: open-latest-download
commands.title: Open Latest Download
commands.description: Opens the last downloaded file or folder

commands.name: copy-latest-download
commands.title: Copy Latest Download
commands.description: Copies the last downloaded file or folder

commands.name: show-latest-download
commands.title: Show Latest Download
commands.description: Show the last downloaded file or folder in Finder
